title: Western Font
author: areneros

comments.content:
It appears to be a freemium typeface called Big Top, which itself is derived from Dan X. Solo’s Circustime (only appears to have been available on the CD that accompanied the Dover Circus book):  
 [http://abfonts.freehostia.com/solopedia/solopedia-c.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172028/http:/abfonts.freehostia.com/solopedia/solopedia-c.htm "http://abfonts.freehostia.com/solopedia/solopedia-c.htm")

Fontmesa’s Buckhorn comes close:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/buckhorn/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172028/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/buckhorn/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/buckhorn/")
